typeOfLoss.description: The type of business the loss applies to.

businessId.description: The unique identifier of the income source the claim relates to.

typeOfClaim.description: The type of claim to be applied. Note that carry-sideways-fhl and carry-forward-to-carry-sideways are only permitted when the type of loss is set to uk-property-non-fhl.

taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to, for example, 2019-20. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2019-21 is not valid. The minimum tax year is 2019-20.
